author: lehors
msg: As I was poking around Xerces, I came across a pair of bugs in the
implementation of Node.normalize().  The problems are:
1) Normalizing an element does not normalize the attributes of the element.
2) Normalize does not remove isolated, empty text nodes.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'help'.

author: lehors
msg: range package was renamed ranges in DOM Level 2 Rec

author: jeffreyr
msg: added DeclHandler examples which shows bug in X2 with handling AttributeDecl in SAX
